overview: Angel (Donita) believes that her true love is Hendra (Ajun Perwira). But a tragedy happens when she gets hit by a luxurious car driven by Martin (Evan Sanders). Instead of helping her, Martin runs away. Angel survives only to find the bitter reality that both her legs are amputated. Angel is further shocked by Hendra who disappears after learning about her condition.
title: My Last Love
